title: Language Competency Enhancement Program Based on Digital Learning Ecosystems

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language proficiency in specialized fields and experience using digital tools
context.additional_context: Workplace-oriented language learning environment for medical/legal/technical professionals

learning_goals: Learners establish and execute self-directed learning plans with over 80% adherence within a digital learning ecosystem.
Learners complete at least three domain-specific language projects using collaboration tools, thereby constructing knowledge.
Learners advance their language proficiency (speaking/writing) by at least one level through a competency-based assessment system.

Learners can design a Python-based language solution for a public service scenario (e.g., electronic document processing system) applying task-centered design principles and develop a prototype rated 4 or higher (5-point scale) in "functional completeness" and "usability" by at least two out of three peer evaluators.

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Jitsi Meet, Notion, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
